Zenmed Essential Eye Serum

Brand: ZENMED

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Purified Water, Certified Organic Aloe Vera Gel, Dimethicone, Vitamin C, Carbomer, Matrixyl, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate, Caffeine, Steareth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin.

Directions: Using ring finger & with very little pressure, gently pat & smooth a

ntly pat & smooth a small amount of serum under the eye & onto browbone. Let dry

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
